titleStmt.title: The care vvich vvee haue had, and paines vvhich wee haue taken to settle the affaires of this Church of England in an uniformitie as well of doctrine, as of gouernment, ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie.,

notesStmt.note: Title from opening lines of text.
Dated at end: Otelands the sixteenth day of Iuly, 1604 in the second yeere of our raigne ...
Requiring that ministers conform to the Church of England by 30 Nov. Cf. STC.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
